scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This bound volume records the minutes of the New Kent District Baptist Sunday School meetings from 1938-1955. Included are the names of officers, financial reports, and the agenda for each meeting. The New Kent District of Hanover County was comprised of the following black churches: Mount Zion, Lebanon, Second Liberty, New Branch, and New Elam.
